name: Fallingblox
description:
Fallingblox... a game that mostly explains itself in the title!

    Yet another game I made in 20 minutes, I'm honestly pretty stoked with it.

    Click the blocks... and don't let too many fall off the screen!

    Each block that falls off the screen subtracts 8 from your score

     Avoid the lava blocks (not in practice mode)

    If you get -1 you fail, and the time you lasted is the highscore

    It's sounds a lot harder than it really is... give it a go! Should work on all touchscreen      devices!

NEW: Use practice if you need an easier mode!  Only subtracts 2 from your score instead of 8!

KNOWN ISSUES:

  • Text offset on the Y in the browser version
